LISP

Lisp is a programmable programming language1.

Lisp is unique and different2, because all languages heading towards to Lisp3.

Lisp has no syntax, because you work on abstract syntax tree.

Lisp has a macro system no other language has.

Lisp is like atoms to build chemical materials. Bottom-Up Design1.

Lisp is not an invention, but more of a discovery3.

Lisp is a secreat weapon4.

Lisp can be written in itself3.
